Package breakout.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakout.model.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Board class aggregates block, ball, and paddle. Responsible for communicating with the View class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int BALL_HEIGHT

      Board​(java.awt.Insets frameInsets, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue queue)
      This is the constructor which initializes instance variables needed to aggregate ball, block and paddle.

      • getLives

        public int getLives()

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Ends the game by sending an EndGameMessage with the starting ball and starting paddle coordinates and the lives remaining which should be 0.

      • resetGame

        public void resetGame()
        Not restarting game, but just resetting ball and paddle when a life is lost.

      • moveBall

        public void moveBall()
        Moves the ball and will handle collision between the relation of ball with the paddle and the view. Ball can bounce off the paddle and off the top, left, and right of the panel.
